lines.text: get some sleepbaby, I'll wake you once dinner's ready
let's just stay here a little while
Now come on honey, I got to start dinner
You don't have to start now, why don't you start it later?

[hesitant]
Oh come on Jack I... I
[she glances at Kirshner]
Is he bothering you? I'll cover his head with a pillowcase.

[with disgust]
You must be joking! Is that all you people think about?

[with disgust]
It's no use honey, maybe when I get used to it
[walks off]

[turns to Kirshner]
Now you know you got to go!
Philip, get me another body.
What the hell is the matter with you, Moss? Get back to bed!
You jive.
It's all right, honey, I'm not gonna hurt you.
You get into more shit...
Williams! If you cut off my head, that'll be murder!
You actually feel I could take credit for something with which I had very little to do?
I don't understand you.
The reason you don't understand, Doctor, is because you're a *bigot*. A bigot of the highest caliber. And because of that, you have underestimated me and my intelligence.
Phillip... Get me another body... please.

[Kirshner's head smokes a cigarette. The smoke comes out of Jack's mouth. Disgusted he removes the cigarette from Kirshner's mouth]
Hey man, don't be smoking a cigarette while I'm eating!

[revs the motocross bike]
ready?
You're going to get us all killed!
[Jack drives off on the bike]
